backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 72 Amroth Avenue

noticeDescription:
NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto’s real estate disposal By-law, on July 13, 2023 the City-owned parcel of land located at 72 Amroth Avenue, legally described as PT BLK A PL 656 MIDWAY; PT LT 3-6 PL 656 MIDWAY AS IN CT552911 EXCEPT THE EASEMENT THEREIN, EX56157, EX50521, EX49078, EX49203, EX49583, EX50208, EX50331, EX51248; CITY OF TORONTO, was declared surplus. The property has a total area of approximately 1,278 m2 (13,756 ft2). 72 Amroth Avenue is an existing 54-space municipal surface parking lot.

 

The City proposes that the intended manner of disposal is to be by way of transfer to Build Toronto Inc., CreateTO's corporate entity, to develop missing middle housing.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Eric Allen, Senior Project Manager, Tel: 416-392-1852, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until August 3, 2023
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 72 Amroth Avenue
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
